name: Loophole (theepsi)
description:
"Simple" bullet hell but... you're trapped in a loop!!!

Try to reach a high score (seconds in game) while escaping from the bullets.

Comment down below your high score, so we can compare and see who's the best at this game.

This game is the result of Ludum Dare 47, take a look to the link below and make sure to check other games too!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/loophole-2
